Description: Optimized profile for Logitech G29 - Balanced for drifting and precision driving

TuningNotes.SelfCentering: Set to 0.52 - G29 motors are slightly smoother, so a bit lighter centering feels natural
TuningNotes.RoadFeel: Set to 0.72 - Slightly higher than G920 to leverage G29's smoother detail response
TuningNotes.OversteerStrength: Set to 0.72 - Strong counter-steer assistance for learning drifts
TuningNotes.UndersteerStrength: Set to 0.48 - Wheel goes light when pushing too hard
TuningNotes.DamperStrength: Set to 0.16 - G29 benefits from slightly less damping due to smoother gears
TuningNotes.MinForceThreshold: Set to 0.012 - G29 can handle slightly finer forces than G920
